item.title: How to Upload a File in Laravel Ajax Way Using Vue Js and Get Absolute Path in Api Response to Show in Frontend
item.description: function for uploading video VideoController.php public function post_video_details(Request $request) { $uploadedFile = $request->file('file'); $without_extension = pathinfo($uploadedFile->getClientOriginalName(), PATHINFO_FILENAME); // getting only file name without extension to make it slugify $extension = $uploadedFile->getClientOriginalExtension(); $without_extension = str_slug($without_extension); // make slugify only name $filename = time().$without_extension.'.'.$extension; // time() + name + . + extension Storage::disk('local')->putFileAs( 'public/uploads/', $uploadedFile, $filename ); // putFileAs take 3 parameters. 1.folder, 2.file 3.my_desired_filename Video::create([ 'title' => $request->title, 'video' => $filename, 'user_id' => auth()->id(), ]); // adding info to the database return response()->json([ 'success' => 'Video Details update successfully', ]); } transforming single instance in model for api response Video.
